abstract: Monday’s semifinal installment of “Dancing With the Stars” lifted ABC to an easy victory in the night’s ratings. According to Nielsen’s estimates, 23.1 million viewers tuned in to the celebrity competition from 8 to 9:30 p.m., the series’ best showing since its fall finale last November. The strong ratings also helped boost ABC’s “Samantha Who,” which followed at 9:30 with a series-best 15.4 million viewers.
lead_paragraph: Monday’s semifinal installment of “Dancing With the Stars” lifted ABC to an easy victory in the night’s ratings. According to Nielsen’s estimates, 23.1 million viewers tuned in to the celebrity competition from 8 to 9:30 p.m., the series’ best showing since its fall finale last November. The strong ratings also helped boost ABC’s “Samantha Who,” which followed at 9:30 with a series-best 15.4 million viewers.
